title: Bug 17289 - Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not take focus anymore. However, if I drop down the combo list, it will take focus.
OB: When I click on the first Combo, it does not take focus.
EB: When I click on the first Combo, it should take focus.
SR:
To reproduce the bug:
1. Open the application.
2. Locate the first Combo.
3. Click on the first Combo and observe that it does not take focus.
